tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: Merge multiple VCF/BCF files from non-overlapping sample sets to create one multi-sample file
tool.command:
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## Default section ${sec_default.force_samples} ${sec_default.print_header} #if $sec_default.use_header: --use-header "${sec_default.use_header}" #end if #set values_sec_default_apply_filters = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.apply_filters_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_apply_filters: --apply-filters "${values_sec_default_apply_filters}" #end if #if $sec_default.info_rules: --info-rules "${sec_default.info_rules}" #end if #if $sec_default.file_list: --file-list "${sec_default.file_list}" #end if #if $sec_default.merge: --merge "${sec_default.merge}" #end if #if $sec_default.output: --output "${sec_default.output}" #end if #if str($sec_default.select_output_type) != "__none__": --output-type "${sec_default.select_output_type}" #end if #set values_sec_default_regions = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.regions_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_regions: --regions "${values_sec_default_regions}" #end if #if $sec_default.regions_file: --regions-file "${sec_default.regions_file}" #end if
## Primary Input/Outputs

param.name: print_header
param.label: Print Header
param.help: print only the merged header and exit

param.name: info_rules
param.label: Info Rules
param.help: rules for merging INFO fields (method is one of sum,avg,min,max,join) or "-" to turn off the default [DP:sum,DP4:sum]

param.name: file_list
param.label: File List
param.help: read file names from the file

param.name: merge
param.label: Merge
param.help: allow multiallelic records for <snps|indels|both|all|none|id>, see man page for details [both]

tool.help: Merge multiple VCF/BCF files from non-overlapping sample sets to create one multi-sample file. Note that only records from different files can be merged, never from the same file. For "vertical" merge take a look at "bcftools norm" instead.
